channel.title: 3d on Eli's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in 3d on Eli's Blog

item.title: Skin texturing renders
item.description: Hey there everyone! I enrolled in Think Tank Training Centre’s Online program last October for those of you who don’t know. I’m in my second term, and I chose the Characters for Games path. These renders are the result of a week and a half of texturing. I was a little too excited and might have gone overboard with the number of renders I did. The next post will be about creating the texture and my general mindset while doing it.
